com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.Navigator

  • public class Navigator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with several methods useful for navigation.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateSensorBearingOffset()
      Calculate offset between bearing provided by sensors and bearing provided by geolocation.
      double getAbsoluteDirection()
      Calculate absolute direction to current destination.
      double getCurrentBearing()
      Calculate most accurate current bearing, depending on available sensors and data.
      float getCurrentSpeed()
      Calculate most accurate current speed, depending on available sensors and data.
      AriadneLocation getDestination()
      Get destination location.
      float getDistance()
      Calculate distance to current destination.
      double getHeightDifference()
      Calculate height difference to current destination.
      AriadneLocation getLocation()
      Retrieve Location.
      double getLocationBearing()
      Get location based bearing.
      AriadneLocation getPreviousLocation()
      Retrieve Previous Location.
      double getRelativeDirection()
      Calculate direction to current destination, relative to current bearing.
      double getSensorBearingOffset()
      Offset between bearing provided by sensors and bearing provided by geolocation, used to calibrate current bearing.
      Navigator.TravelDirection getTravelDirection()
      Current detected travel direction.
      boolean isBearingAccurate()
      Determines if current bearing is accurate, if sensor based bearing is accurate OR if location (GPS) based bearing is accurate.
      boolean isDestinationReached()
      Check if current location is destination.
      boolean isLocationAccurate()
      Determines if current location is accurate, if it is set, if it is recent and if the accuracy is reasonable.
      boolean isLocationBearingAccurate()
      Determines if location (GPS signal) based bearing is accurate, if the current location is accurate, if previous location is set, if the previous location is recent, if the current location is not equal to the previous location and if the distance between the two is larger than the accuracy.
      boolean isSensorBearingAccurate()
      Determines if sensor based bearing is accurate.

      Set destination location.

        Returns:
        true if location is accurate

      • isBearingAccurate

        public final boolean isBearingAccurate()
        Determines if current bearing is accurate, if sensor based bearing is accurate OR if location (GPS) based bearing is accurate.
        Returns:
        true if bearing is accurate

      • isSensorBearingAccurate

        public final boolean isSensorBearingAccurate()
        Determines if sensor based bearing is accurate.
        Returns:
        true if sensor based bearing is accurate

      • isLocationBearingAccurate

        public final boolean isLocationBearingAccurate()
        Determines if location (GPS signal) based bearing is accurate, if the current location is accurate, if previous location is set, if the previous location is recent, if the current location is not equal to the previous location and if the distance between the two is larger than the accuracy.
        Returns:
        true if location based bearing is accurate

      • calculateSensorBearingOffset

        public final void calculateSensorBearingOffset()
        Calculate offset between bearing provided by sensors and bearing provided by geolocation.
